description: Fit beau Pietro Duarte is in a café sitting at a table near cute, ripped Gabriel Cross and dark-haired Damon Heart as they say their goodbyes, and take in each other’s faces one last time before athletic Damon jets off across the world. Damon heads off, and Pietro engages with Gabriel to express how much he would love being in a relationship, but Gabriel confesses that he wanted to end it, and can’t wait until Damon leaves. Gabriel propositions Pietro with an offer to be his decoy, and invites him over to watch the couple suck and fuck so he can eventually take over for him when Damon returns.
title: The Decoy: Part 1
